transcript:
Customer: Kuch toh log kahenge.

Hello?
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Ah, Siddharth ji, main Rishal baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap?
Executive: Badhiya. 
Customer: Ji, ah, haan, ek aapka ek update aaya tha hamare paas service team back ko leke.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan. Bataiye.
Customer: Complaint mein dal rakha hai na maine usme dekho na kya dikkat hai mere. Account ke andar mera renew kiya tha account.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Account ke baad mein jo pehle wali jo meri sari suvidhaye thi woh waisi ki waisi chal rahi hai.
Customer: Naye, naye jo account mein mere ko mila tha aapka extra jo bhi item, extra facility kuch bhi update nahi hua abhi tak.
Executive: Woh 20 non lapsible buyleads thi woh aapko credit ho gayi hai agar aap apna account check karenge toh. 
Customer: Kab? 20 non lapsible, haan, 20 non lapsible buyleads woh humne jo hai allocation mein dali hui thi woh process ho gayi hai.
Executive: Kab hui hai?
Executive: Theek hai woh, woh aap check kar sakte hain aapko dikh jayenge aapke account mein please ek baar check kar lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai aur baki?
Executive: Is, theek hai yeh wali cheez thi jo hamare paas thi update mein ki aapko 20 non lapsible buyleads karani hai jo ki humne kara di hai iske baad bataiye iske alawa.
Customer: Baki toh services jismein aap pehle the usi mein aap the matlab basic services thi mini dynamic catalog aapne as it is wahi services mein apni services continue kari thi.
Executive: Yeh MDC woh premium liya tha na is baar maine.
Customer: Aapka jo premium plan tha mere paas uska aapke jo mere us samay account manager jo the unka jo likha hua mere paas main aapko screenshot bhejta hu mere ko whatsapp pe aap likh ke bhejo batata hu main.
Executive: Okay, sir aapne jo last pay kiya tha price amount apna starting mein 33040 rupees wahi price aapne hume is saal pay kiya hai apna jab amount same hai toh services bhi toh same rahengi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Proposal mein bhi toh likha hua hai.
Customer: Hua tha na mam jab mera usme mera account expire ho raha tha shayad November mein hai na?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Toh ek ya do mahine pehle payment mere se isiliye liya tha aap logo ne ki hum aapko extra yeh de rahe hain toh agar aap pehle isko renew kar lete hain toh.
Executive: Main bata toh rahi hu humne aapko 20 non lapsible buyleads jo hai woh unhone offer kari thi woh humne aapko credit kara di hai.
Customer: Keval ek nahi isme kam se kam cheh se saat item aur extra hote hain main aapko whatsapp karta hu na mere ko. Whatsapp kariye aap mere ko aapke number kaunsa whatsapp wala uske aage likh ke bhejiye main bhejta hu aapko kya kya mere ko diya tha aur kya kya mila hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.


Executive: Kiya message.
Customer: Bhejta hu main aapko dekhna hoga na. Free hoke call karta hu main aapko.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap mujhe update kar dijiye us par kyunki aage bhi aap se discussion karna hai na aapne jo bhi usme likha hai waise toh aapne complaint mein toh aisa kuch nahi likha hai ki aapko kya kya kaha gaya tha aur jo bhi cheeze aapne.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Bhejta hu whatsapp kar raha hu aapko dekhna.
Executive: Nahi aap mujhe whatsapp toh kar denge mujhe yeh bataiye ki phir is bare mein baat kab ho payegi aapki kyunki mujhe toh yeh baat karni hai main subah se four five times aap se baat karne ki koshish kar chuki hu aap mujhe kab aap call.
Customer: Awaaz aa rahi hai aapki mam aapko awaaz nahi aa rahi thi meri teen se char baar phone aa gaya tha aapko.
Executive: Haan haan. 
Customer: Mere ko aapko awaaz nahi aa rahi thi mujhe haan haan haan isiliye phone se baat nahi ho rahi thi.
Executive: Accha aapko meri awaaz aa rahi thi us par?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Mujhe aapki awaaz nahi aa rahi thi main four times call kiya main wahi keh rahi hu mujhe awaaz nahi aa rahi aapki.
Customer: Koi baat nahi chalo. Whatsapp karke ghante ek mein call kariye mere ko wapas aap karte hain.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye abhi 4 baj rahe hain kitne baje connect karu baat karne ke liye?
Customer: 5:00 baje 5:00 baje kareeb kariye.
Executive: 5:00 baje ke kareeb theek hai aap mujhe whatsapp kar dijiye main 5:00 baje aapko connect karti hu.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Account renewed, previous facilities still running.

- New account benefits not yet updated.

- Claims premium MDC taken, needs confirmation.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed 20 non-lapsible buyleads credited.

- Asked customer to check account for buyleads.

- Executive requested WhatsApp with details for review.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will WhatsApp details, call back at 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, account update, mdc
